properties.headline: Flood Watch issued February 12 at 3:54AM CST until February 13 at 12:00AM CST by NWS Springfield MO
properties.description:
The Flood Watch continues for

* A portion of south central Missouri, including the following
areas, Howell, Oregon, and Shannon.

* Through this evening

* Around an inch of rain is expected during the day today. Wet
soil conditions along with the lack of vegetation in the winter
will cause rainfall to runoff quickly resulting in potential
flooding.

* Flooding of low water crossings and low lying roadways near
streams, creeks, and rivers will be possible, creating
potentially dangerous travel conditions on roads susceptible
to flooding
properties.instruction:
A Flood Watch means there is a potential for flooding based on
current forecasts.

You should monitor later forecasts and be alert for possible
Flood Warnings. Those living in areas prone to flooding should be
prepared to take action should flooding develop.

NWSheadline: FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT THROUGH THIS EVENING
